message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you 20% of the total. You can do better or worse in the next round.
You're starting high, Alice. I'll take a moderate split this time.
You're right, I was high last time. This time I'll give you a slightly larger share. Take it or leave it.
I'm not going to get taken advantage of. I'll match your offer this time.
